abstract: Baseball Roundup; Major League Baseball Commissioner Rob Manfred declines to give details about league's forthcoming plan for improving fan safety at stadiums; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Rob Manfred said that fan safety was paramount and that the 30 clubs had encouraged the league to move forward conceptually

headline.main: M.L.B. Nears Plan for Netting to Protect Fans
headline.print_headline: M.L.B. Nears Plan for Netting to Protect Fans

snippet: Commissioner Rob Manfred said that fan safety was paramount and that the 30 clubs had encouraged the league to move forward conceptually
